154 Cannot view pictures into content and file manager



  • 2007-04-23 17:29:30

    154 Cannot view pictures into content and file manager

    After uploading this images with File Manager from Edit Content, the pictures are not displaying in the File Manager window, And this error message apears "The requested URL /atutor/content/1/img/network.jpg was not found on this server". With File Manager from Manage, this pictures can be viewed but if the images are inserted in course Course Content, they can't be displayed.

    I would like if it's possible an ideea, a solution to this problem?


    Things to describe:
    operating system -Linux
    version of ATutor -154
    versions of php -5.0.5
    version of mysq l -4.1.10
    webserver & version -Apache
    web browser being used -Firefox, IE7

  • 2007-04-26 08:34:00

    Re: 154: Cannot view pictures into content and file manager

    This is more likely a problem with the webserver setup, than with ATutor. Someone would need to login to your server to investigate, and then it may be something your system administrator may need to address.

    We have fee for service support available if you need us to login to your installation to track down the problem.
